articles.title: Trying not to waste a single drop of coronavirus vaccine - The Washington Post
articles.description: Shots must be administered or discarded within six hours of reaching room temperature. When doses remain, the hunt begins for recipients.

articles.title: Opioid use might increase risk of developing pancreatic cancer - ANI News
articles.description: Washington [US], January 7 (ANI): Researchers at Rush University Medical Center have found that opioid use might increase a person's risk of developing pancreatic cancer.

articles.title: Study: Sexual dysfunction hits some women harder than others as they age - Hindustan Times
articles.description: A new study identified the determinants that affect a woman’s risk of sexual dysfunction and sought to determine the effectiveness of hormone therapy in decreasing that risk and modifying sexual behaviour.
